meanings.definition: One of two or more alternative forms of a gene that arise by mutation and are found at the same place on a chromosome.
meanings.sent1: In genetics, an allele is a different version of a gene that can affect traits.
meanings.sent2: The allele for eye color can be either brown or blue.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if the allele for being a morning person or a night owl is inherited.
meanings.sent4: The allele for intelligence seems to be a complex puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The allele for height can determine if someone will be tall or short.
